title: 35 Expensive Gifts Worth the Splurge
description: Feeling a little fancy? We’ve got just the right high-design finds for you
author: Audrey Lee
excerpt: Looking for luxury gifts? Check out the the best (albeit expensive) gifts around, including luxe skin care, Dyson gadgets, Apple goodies, designer bags, and more
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Though we don’t think the most expensive gifts are necessarily the best ones, there are those special occasions like the holidays where it’s appropriate to go all out for your loved one. So if you’re looking to treat someone on your list that’s been extra good (or maybe even treat yourself), we’ve rounded up some of the best expensive gifts to give when money’s no object. The best part? Though each of our stylish selections is undoubtedly luxurious, they’ll still show your recipient you put tons of care into selecting a thoughtful present. Keep scrolling to shop some of the best luxury gift options—including a high-end espresso machine, professional-grade massage gun, state-of-the-art pizza oven, and much more.Shop our top picks:Best Gift For Wellness Aficionados: Theragun Prime, $299 at TherabodyBest Kitchen Gadget Gift: Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter Kit, $299 at AmazonBest Gift For Homebodies: Parachute Linen Bed Bundle, $799 at ParachuteBest Gift For Travelers: Rimowa Original Cabin Suitcase, $1,430 at RimowaBest Host/Hostess Gift: Sabre Flatware Set, $430 at SSENSEBest Gift For Outdoor Lovers: Solo Stove Yukon 2.0, $450 at Solo Stove1/35Theragun Prime (5th generation)Up their wellness and self-care routine with the latest from Theragun. Achy joints won’t stand a chance against the Theragun Prime, whose rotating percussion arm and ergonomic multigrip deliver professional-grade muscle treatments to your sore spots. It’s also got five customizable speed ranges, Bluetooth capabilities, and built-in technology that keeps noise levels at a soothingly low level.2/35Cuzen Matcha Matcha Maker Starter KitIf their taste buds lean more towards tea, we think Cuzen Matcha’s Matcha Maker Starter Kit is a worthwhile investment. With one click, it grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a shot of matcha that you can enjoy with your favorite milk, over ice, or both. The artfully designed machine (which holds leaves for up to 20 matcha drinks at a time) even allows you to control how much matcha you want in your shot for a quick and easy way to enjoy a fresh drink any time.3/35 Sabre Off-White Bistrot Vintage Flatware SetThis 24-piece cutlery set from French label Sabre features handcrafted tortoiseshell acrylic handles to really impress your guests at the next dinner party.4/35Parachute Linen Starter Bedroom Bundle (Queen)Give the gift of luxurious sleep with this highly rated Parachute bedroom kit. Each gift set comes with two pillows and a duvet insert, as well as a fitted sheet, pillowcase set, and duvet cover in the brand’s ultra-comfortable linen.5/35Yukon 2.0Next up on our list of the best expensive gifts is this quirky pick that's perfect for that one friend that's always camping. They'll love taking this portable and smokeless fire pit on their next getaway.6/35Bottega Veneta Brown Long Andiamo Clutch7/35Naked Cashmere Ynes RobeSlipping into a heavenly cashmere robe after a long day will make her feel ultra luxe. This one from Naked cashmere comes in nine sumptuous shades and is available for him as well.8/35Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete LongWe swear by Dyson products, and this is the undisputed Cadillac of hair styling tools. The tech-savvy gadget simultaneously dries and styles hair with three precise airflow speeds to suit your needs—a perfect gift idea whether it’s for the holidays, a birthday, or anything else.9/35Ooni Koda 12 Gas Powered Pizza OvenIt sounds like everyone—from our digital design writer Zoë Sessums to Andrew Rea (aka Binging with Babish)—approves of Ooni's pizza oven. With the ability to cook a fresh 12-inch pizza pie in just 60 seconds, say goodbye to the days of waiting for delivery.10/35Sonos 2 Room Set with Era 100This easy-to-use pair of Sonos bluetooth speakers helps set the mood across multiple rooms. Compact enough to fit in just about any space, your giftee can play or stream crystal-clear audio directly from their phone or tablet, or with help from their virtual assistant.11/35Rimowa Original Cabin 22-Inch Wheeled Carry-OnAnd for that special someone who's constantly hopping on and off flights, upgrade their old luggage to a sturdy Rimowa, the brand beloved by everyone from Rihanna to Robert Pattinson.12/35KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Stand MixerNothing will say I love you and your cooking like giving what’s regarded as the gold standard of stand mixers. And while you’re at it, why not throw in some fun add-ons like attachments for making pasta, juice, and shredding veggies?13/35Aesop Rōzu EnsembleIf you’re looking for a great gift to bring to an upcoming housewarming party, consider this high-end fragrance and moisturizing set from celebrity-beloved Aussie brand Aesop.14/35Lunya Washable Silk Bestsellers KitThere's nothing quite like slipping into comfy loungewear at the end of your day. This mulberry silk pajama set from Lunya includes four bestsellers from the brand they can actually wear both indoors and out.15/35Eames Lounge Chair and OttomanAfter tying out the incomparable Eames Lounge Chair for herself, our former social media manager Elise Portale concluded, “The Eameses built the impossible: A chair that’s comfortable no matter how you want to sit in it.”16/35Celina BackpackFor the commuter or perpetual traveler on your gifting list, this Tumi backpack is the perfect holiday gift that can fit daily essentials like their current read and lunch box or enough clothing for a weekend getaway.17/35Le Creuset Signature 7.25-Quart Round Enameled Cast Iron Dutch OvenWe don't know anyone who wouldn't love unwrapping a lovely Le Creuset dutch oven (especially in this striking shade of artichoke green).18/35Brayden Linen Duvet CoverIf they only sleep on linen, we think this Missoni’s duvet cover will be an instant hit. Made in Italy and emblazoned with the brand’s iconic zigzag motif, this gift will instantly elevate their bedtime rituals.19/35Breville Barista Touch Espresso MachineAnyone who’s a serious caffeine enthusiast will enjoy this sleek stainless steel espresso machine with over 1,000 five-star reviews from Breville. It’s got features like an interactive touch screen for easy drink selection as well as a built-in grinder, steam wand, and an ultra-fast heating system to serve up steaming cups of café-quality java from the comfort of your own kitchen.20/35Serena & Lily Tulum Bar SetPerfect for any summer home, this rattan-clad bar kit will come in handy when nights at the beach call for martinis and conversation outdoors.21/35SK-II Pitera Bestsellers KitLevel up anyone’s skin care routine with this collection of bestsellers from SK-II. After all, the cult-followed J-beauty brand is known to hydrate and nourish skin (and counts Robert Pattinson and Chloë Grace Moretz as fans).22/35The Ginori "Martina" Complete Dinnerware SetFor avid dinnerware collectors, this Cabana-exclusive Ginori 1735 set is elegant with inherent cool factor. Featuring a timeless yet eye-catching floral motif that will never go out of style, it’s a thoughtful gift that your favorite host or hostess will covet for years to come.23/35Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones And for the over-the-ear set, you can't go wrong with these astonishingly crisp Bluetooth headphones from Bose.24/35Monica Vinader Lab Grown Diamond Riva Kite Pendant Charm SetMinimalist jewelry aficionados will love how this delicate diamond necklace catches the light and adds some sparkle to mundane outfits.25/35Alessi Silver Virgil Abloh Occasional Object Cutlery SetDesigned by the late Virgil Abloh, this 18/10 stainless steel flatware trio from Italian brand Alessi includes a logo-etched fork, squared spoon, blunt-tip serrated knife, and carabiner that can hold each set together.26/35Boroux Legacy Water Filter SystemBoroux’s water purification system effectively removes harmful chemicals and bacteria from your hydration routine. With the ability to clean up to 24,000 gallons of water, the four-filter filtration device has been backed by lab-driven results to guarantee you’re hydrating with only the purest water.27/3584 Rouge Hermès Abysse Shiny LipstickDress up their cosmetics bag with some high-end everyday products. We especially like that the container to this Hermes lipstick almost reminds us of a James Turrell piece.28/35Apple Watch Series 9This year surprise your loved one with a smart watch in lieu of a regular timepiece. The Apple watch can make calls, send messages, monitor heart rate, and is water-resistant (not to mention, it will perfectly complement your iPhone and AirPods Pro).29/35Frederica Magazine TableThere’s plenty of ways your giftee will be able to style this handsome magazine table. We’d pair it with a chic lamp, a beautiful candle, and of course their favorite magazine subscription.30/35Loewe Home Scents Ivy Large Scented CandleWhen we asked our editor-in-chief Amy Astley about one of her latest MVP purchases, she pointed us in the direction of this next-level candle from Loewe. “I love the chunkiness, the heft, [and] the jumbo size,” she says. Amy adds that when the candle has burned down, “you can keep the vessel for anything you want—and it’s nice that this one isn’t delicate and teeny.” (Looking for more candle inspo? Check out our guide to the best-smelling candles with faves from Diptyque, Voluspa, Boy Smells and more.)31/35Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge Eau de ParfumVelvety notes of jasmine, saffron, cedarwood, and ambergris make up Baccarat and Francis Kurkdjian’s Rouge 540 scent, beloved by celebrities like Olivia Rodrigo.32/35Onirique Table Lamp by Athena CalderoneWe think Athena Calderone’s newest designs for Crate & Barrel make very good gifts for the design-conscious crowd. The Onirique statement lamp will add some sex appeal and mystique to any bare coffee table, console, or nightstand.33/35Incense HolderIf their prized possession is a Haller storage unit, this USM incense holder made in collaboration with Bernard James is just the thing that’ll delight.34/35Made In Stainless 13-Piece SetFeaturing stand-outs from Made In's high-quality Stainless Clad, Non Stick, and Carbon Steel collections, this curated cookware set is the ultimate treat for aspiring chefs and serious home cooks this Christmas.35/35Architectural Narrative Tuscany StayThe name of this stay says it all—spend a well-deserved vacation in this thoughtfully designed converted warehouse while you bask in all of Italy’s beauty.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Though we don’t think the most expensive gifts are necessarily the best ones, there are those special occasions like the holidays where it’s appropriate to go all out for your loved one. So if you’re looking to treat someone on your list that’s been extra good (or maybe even treat yourself), we’ve rounded up some of the best expensive gifts to give when money’s no object. The best part? Though each of our stylish selections is undoubtedly luxurious, they’ll still show your recipient you put tons of care into selecting a thoughtful present. Keep scrolling to shop some of the best luxury gift options—including a high-end espresso machine, professional-grade massage gun, state-of-the-art pizza oven, and much more.

Shop our top picks:

  • Best Gift For Wellness Aficionados: Theragun Prime, $299 at Therabody
  • Best Kitchen Gadget Gift: Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter Kit, $299 at Amazon
  • Best Gift For Homebodies: Parachute Linen Bed Bundle, $799 at Parachute
  • Best Gift For Travelers: Rimowa Original Cabin Suitcase, $1,430 at Rimowa
  • Best Host/Hostess Gift: Sabre Flatware Set, $430 at SSENSE
  • Best Gift For Outdoor Lovers: Solo Stove Yukon 2.0, $450 at Solo Stove

  • 1/35

    Theragun Prime (5th generation)

    Up their wellness and self-care routine with the latest from Theragun. Achy joints won’t stand a chance against the Theragun Prime, whose rotating percussion arm and ergonomic multigrip deliver professional-grade muscle treatments to your sore spots. It’s also got five customizable speed ranges, Bluetooth capabilities, and built-in technology that keeps noise levels at a soothingly low level.

  • 2/35

    Cuzen Matcha Matcha Maker Starter Kit

    If their taste buds lean more towards tea, we think Cuzen Matcha’s Matcha Maker Starter Kit is a worthwhile investment. With one click, it grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a shot of matcha that you can enjoy with your favorite milk, over ice, or both. The artfully designed machine (which holds leaves for up to 20 matcha drinks at a time) even allows you to control how much matcha you want in your shot for a quick and easy way to enjoy a fresh drink any time.

  • 3/35

    Sabre Off-White Bistrot Vintage Flatware Set

    This 24-piece cutlery set from French label Sabre features handcrafted tortoiseshell acrylic handles to really impress your guests at the next dinner party.

  • 4/35

    Parachute Linen Starter Bedroom Bundle (Queen)

    Give the gift of luxurious sleep with this highly rated Parachute bedroom kit. Each gift set comes with two pillows and a duvet insert, as well as a fitted sheet, pillowcase set, and duvet cover in the brand’s ultra-comfortable linen.

  • 5/35

    Yukon 2.0

    Next up on our list of the best expensive gifts is this quirky pick that's perfect for that one friend that's always camping. They'll love taking this portable and smokeless fire pit on their next getaway.

  • 6/35

    Bottega Veneta Brown Long Andiamo Clutch

  • 7/35

    Naked Cashmere Ynes Robe

    Slipping into a heavenly cashmere robe after a long day will make her feel ultra luxe. This one from Naked cashmere comes in nine sumptuous shades and is available for him as well.

  • 8/35

    Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long

    We swear by Dyson products, and this is the undisputed Cadillac of hair styling tools. The tech-savvy gadget simultaneously dries and styles hair with three precise airflow speeds to suit your needs—a perfect gift idea whether it’s for the holidays, a birthday, or anything else.

  • 9/35

    Ooni Koda 12 Gas Powered Pizza Oven

    It sounds like everyone—from our digital design writer Zoë Sessums to Andrew Rea (aka Binging with Babish)—approves of Ooni's pizza oven. With the ability to cook a fresh 12-inch pizza pie in just 60 seconds, say goodbye to the days of waiting for delivery.

  • 10/35

    Sonos 2 Room Set with Era 100

    This easy-to-use pair of Sonos bluetooth speakers helps set the mood across multiple rooms. Compact enough to fit in just about any space, your giftee can play or stream crystal-clear audio directly from their phone or tablet, or with help from their virtual assistant.

  • 11/35

    Rimowa Original Cabin 22-Inch Wheeled Carry-On

    And for that special someone who's constantly hopping on and off flights, upgrade their old luggage to a sturdy Rimowa, the brand beloved by everyone from Rihanna to Robert Pattinson.

  • 12/35

    KitchenAid Artisan Design Series Stand Mixer

    Nothing will say I love you and your cooking like giving what’s regarded as the gold standard of stand mixers. And while you’re at it, why not throw in some fun add-ons like attachments for making pasta, juice, and shredding veggies?

  • 13/35

    Aesop Rōzu Ensemble

    If you’re looking for a great gift to bring to an upcoming housewarming party, consider this high-end fragrance and moisturizing set from celebrity-beloved Aussie brand Aesop.

  • 14/35

    Lunya Washable Silk Bestsellers Kit

    There's nothing quite like slipping into comfy loungewear at the end of your day. This mulberry silk pajama set from Lunya includes four bestsellers from the brand they can actually wear both indoors and out.

  • 15/35

    Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman

    After tying out the incomparable Eames Lounge Chair for herself, our former social media manager Elise Portale concluded, “The Eameses built the impossible: A chair that’s comfortable no matter how you want to sit in it.”

  • 16/35

    Celina Backpack

    For the commuter or perpetual traveler on your gifting list, this Tumi backpack is the perfect holiday gift that can fit daily essentials like their current read and lunch box or enough clothing for a weekend getaway.

  • 17/35

    Le Creuset Signature 7.25-Quart Round Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven

    We don't know anyone who wouldn't love unwrapping a lovely Le Creuset dutch oven (especially in this striking shade of artichoke green).

  • 18/35

    Brayden Linen Duvet Cover

    If they only sleep on linen, we think this Missoni’s duvet cover will be an instant hit. Made in Italy and emblazoned with the brand’s iconic zigzag motif, this gift will instantly elevate their bedtime rituals.

  • 19/35

    Breville Barista Touch Espresso Machine

    Anyone who’s a serious caffeine enthusiast will enjoy this sleek stainless steel espresso machine with over 1,000 five-star reviews from Breville. It’s got features like an interactive touch screen for easy drink selection as well as a built-in grinder, steam wand, and an ultra-fast heating system to serve up steaming cups of café-quality java from the comfort of your own kitchen.

  • 20/35

    Serena & Lily Tulum Bar Set

    Perfect for any summer home, this rattan-clad bar kit will come in handy when nights at the beach call for martinis and conversation outdoors.

  • 21/35

    SK-II Pitera Bestsellers Kit

    Level up anyone’s skin care routine with this collection of bestsellers from SK-II. After all, the cult-followed J-beauty brand is known to hydrate and nourish skin (and counts Robert Pattinson and Chloë Grace Moretz as fans).

  • 22/35

    The Ginori "Martina" Complete Dinnerware Set

    For avid dinnerware collectors, this Cabana-exclusive Ginori 1735 set is elegant with inherent cool factor. Featuring a timeless yet eye-catching floral motif that will never go out of style, it’s a thoughtful gift that your favorite host or hostess will covet for years to come.

  • 23/35

    Bose QuietComfort Ultra Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones

    And for the over-the-ear set, you can't go wrong with these astonishingly crisp Bluetooth headphones from Bose.

  • 24/35

    Monica Vinader Lab Grown Diamond Riva Kite Pendant Charm Set

    Minimalist jewelry aficionados will love how this delicate diamond necklace catches the light and adds some sparkle to mundane outfits.

  • 25/35

    Alessi Silver Virgil Abloh Occasional Object Cutlery Set

    Designed by the late Virgil Abloh, this 18/10 stainless steel flatware trio from Italian brand Alessi includes a logo-etched fork, squared spoon, blunt-tip serrated knife, and carabiner that can hold each set together.

  • 26/35

    Boroux Legacy Water Filter System

    Boroux’s water purification system effectively removes harmful chemicals and bacteria from your hydration routine. With the ability to clean up to 24,000 gallons of water, the four-filter filtration device has been backed by lab-driven results to guarantee you’re hydrating with only the purest water.

  • 27/35

    84 Rouge Hermès Abysse Shiny Lipstick

    Dress up their cosmetics bag with some high-end everyday products. We especially like that the container to this Hermes lipstick almost reminds us of a James Turrell piece.

  • 28/35

    Apple Watch Series 9

    This year surprise your loved one with a smart watch in lieu of a regular timepiece. The Apple watch can make calls, send messages, monitor heart rate, and is water-resistant (not to mention, it will perfectly complement your iPhone and AirPods Pro).

  • 29/35

    Frederica Magazine Table

    There’s plenty of ways your giftee will be able to style this handsome magazine table. We’d pair it with a chic lamp, a beautiful candle, and of course their favorite magazine subscription.

  • 30/35

    Loewe Home Scents Ivy Large Scented Candle

    When we asked our editor-in-chief Amy Astley about one of her latest MVP purchases, she pointed us in the direction of this next-level candle from Loewe. “I love the chunkiness, the heft, [and] the jumbo size,” she says. Amy adds that when the candle has burned down, “you can keep the vessel for anything you want—and it’s nice that this one isn’t delicate and teeny.” (Looking for more candle inspo? Check out our guide to the best-smelling candles with faves from Diptyque, Voluspa, Boy Smells and more.)

  • 31/35

    Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge Eau de Parfum

    Velvety notes of jasmine, saffron, cedarwood, and ambergris make up Baccarat and Francis Kurkdjian’s Rouge 540 scent, beloved by celebrities like Olivia Rodrigo.

  • 32/35

    Onirique Table Lamp by Athena Calderone

    We think Athena Calderone’s newest designs for Crate & Barrel make very good gifts for the design-conscious crowd. The Onirique statement lamp will add some sex appeal and mystique to any bare coffee table, console, or nightstand.

  • 33/35

    Incense Holder

    If their prized possession is a Haller storage unit, this USM incense holder made in collaboration with Bernard James is just the thing that’ll delight.

  • 34/35

    Made In Stainless 13-Piece Set

    Featuring stand-outs from Made In's high-quality Stainless Clad, Non Stick, and Carbon Steel collections, this curated cookware set is the ultimate treat for aspiring chefs and serious home cooks this Christmas.

  • 35/35

    Architectural Narrative Tuscany Stay

    The name of this stay says it all—spend a well-deserved vacation in this thoughtfully designed converted warehouse while you bask in all of Italy’s beauty.
